All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
This interface is implemented by each Characters' action.
ActionData
This data classes represent a blueprint of the runtime built action to be executed.
ActionVisitor
This class is used to access characters data in order to build and execute their action.
Assistant
This enum contains all type of Assistant card, every card is unique thanks to the combination of value and movement.
BanAction
The ban action is used to ban an island.
BanData
 
Bank
This class represents the Bank used in expert mode
BasicSceneController
Basic interface for all the scene controllers.
Board
This class represents the Board with the islands inside Knows where's MotherNature and knows the strategies to calculate the influences
BoardCli
Class used to build the cli interface of the board with the islands.
BoardSceneController
This class implements the controller of the board scene, the main of the game
CalculateInfluenceAction
This action is used to calculate the influence on a chosen island, when a character permits it.
CalculateInfluenceData
 
CentaurStrategy
The Centaur Strategy doesn't count tower in the influence calc
CharacterCard
This class represent a generic character.
CharacterGui
 
CharacterJSONParser
This class is used to parse the list of characters present in a JSON configuration file
CharacterNotification
This notification is used by the client to tell server the desire of using a character.
CharacterSceneController
This class implements the controller of the characters scene
CharactersDeck
This class represents the deck of characters.
ChooseAssistantNotification
Both client and server use this notification to communicate during the assistant choosing phase
ChooseCloudNotification
Both client and server use this notification to communicate during the cloud choosing phase.
ChooseGameModeNotification
This notification is used by the client to tell server what game mode he chose
ChooseWizAndTowerColorNotification
This notification is used by client and server to communicate during the initial phase of the game
ChooseWizardAndTCController
This class implements the controller of the wizard and tower color choosing scene
Cli
The command line interface implementation of the game.
CLIColor
 
Client
This class represents the client.
ClientController
A controller on client's side.
ClientObservable
The views (GUI,CLI and not the virtual one) extends this interface to communicate with the client controller.
ClientObserver
The client observer implements this interface.
ClientSideVisitor
This class is used by the ClientController to handle a message sent by the server.
CLISymbol
 
Cloud
This class represents the Clouds from where Player can choose a Pawns to move to his School.
CloudCli
Class used to create the cloud
CloudGui
 
CloudManager
This class manages the clouds in the game.
ColorCharacterSceneController
This class implements the controller of the color choosing scene
ColorNotification
With this notification the server tell to the client that the chosen character needs a color to be used, and the client provides it.
Connection
Connection class is a skeleton of what a connection is.
ConnectionSceneController
This class implements the controller of the connection scene
Constants
This class contains constants that are common to all games
Entrance
Entrance of the School
EriantysClient
 
EriantysServer
 
ErrorMessageNotification
This notification is used by the server to tell all the clients in a specific game that a client disconnected and so the game is terminated
FarmerProfStrategy
The Farmer strategy let the player who used the Farmer CharacterCard win even if is involved in a tie
Game
This class represents Eriantys game
GameController
This class handle a specific game.
GameLimit
This is a configuration data class.
GameLimitData
This class represents the limit of a specific Game.
GameLimitParser
 
GameModeSceneController
This class implements the controller of the game mode choosing scene
GenericMessageNotification
A Notification with a generic message sent by the server.
Gui
The graphical user interface implementation of the game.
GuiResources
Resources for the GUI
Hall
Hall of the School
HallManager
This Class manages the hall of all players in game.
HomeSceneController
This class implements the controller of the initial scene
InfluenceStrategy
Interface used to implement strategy pattern to calculate influence on a given island
Island
This class represents the single island with pawns on it, the tower if present and the dimension
IslandCli
Class used to create a single island
IslandGui
 
IslandNotification
With this notification the server tell to the client that the chosen character needs an island to be used, and the client provides it.
KnightStrategy
The knight strategy gives two bonus points to the player who played the Knight CharacterCard
LobbyManager
This class handle the lobby.
LoginNotification
Notification used by both client and server to handle login phase
LoginSceneController
This class implements the controller of the login scene
ModelUpdateNotification
With this notification the model update observers (VirtualView) about the changes occurred.
MoveAction
Thi action is used to move a group of students from a place to another following the logic of the characters.
MoveData
 
MoveMNNotification
Notification used to let client choose the number of steps that Mother Nature musts perform
MoveStudentNotification
This method is used by both client and server to communicate during the move student phase
MushroomSellerStrategy
The MushroomSeller Strategy blocks a color during the calc of the influence
NicknameErrorNotification
If the chosen nickname by a client is used by another, this notification is sent by the server and the nick should be re-inserted.
Notification
Base Notification class.
NotificationVisitor
This interface is used to implement the visitor pattern.
Observable
This class is extended by the model to use the MVC pattern.
Observer
This interface is implemented by the VirtualView to use the pattern MVC "locally" in order to hide the network implementation to the model and controller.
Pair<T,U>
 
PawnColor
This enum contains all possible colors of Pawns.
Pawns
This class represents students (and professors) that are used in this game.
PingNotification
A ping message used by the client to communicate that it's still alive
Place
A Class implements this interface if it can have Pawns on it
PlaceData
 
PlayAssistantSceneController
This class implements the controller of the assistants choose scene
Player
This class represents the Player, the main actor of the game, to player is associated a School.
ProfessorAssignor
The ProfessorAssignor can assign a professor to a player using the strategy in use It also contains the professor not assigned yet.
ProfessorStrategy
This interface is used to implement strategy pattern in the assignment of professor
ProfTable
The Professors Table of the School
Request
Different types of possible requests
RunnableGui
This class starts the main stage and scene
Sack
This class represents the Sack from where Pawns are extracted casually.
ScanListener
This class is used to scan the input from the user.
SceneManager
This class implements a generic scene controller
School
The School of each Player
SchoolExtended
Class used to create the School of the player, an extended and more spacy school
SchoolGui
 
SchoolPlace
Abstract class that represents all School places
SchoolsCli
Class used to show all the schools horizontally
SchoolSmall
Class used to create the School of the others players, a reduced and simpler school
Server
This class represents the server.
ServerSideVisitor
This class is used by the GameController to handle a message sent by the client.
ServerThread
This class handle all new clients' connection, foreach clients instantiate a SocketConnection
SetInfluenceStrategyAction
This action is used to set the strategy of the influence calculation to that specified by the character.
SetInfluenceStrategyData
 
SetProfStrategyAction
This action is used to set the professor assignor's strategy to that specified by the character.
SetProfStrategyData
 
ShortBoard
This class represents a shorted version of the Board that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortCharacter
This class represents a shorted version of a character that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortCloud
This class represents a shorted version of a cloud that can be sent to the clients via network
ShortIsland
This class represents a shorted version of the Island that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortModel
This class represents a shorted version of the model that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortPawns
This class represents a shorted version of a Pawns that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortPlayer
This class represents a shorted version of a Player that can be sent to the clients via network.
ShortSchool
This class represents a shorted version of the School of a player that can be sent to the clients via network
SocketConnection
This class represents a connection between the server and a client.
StandardProfStrategy
The Standard Professor Assignment strategy
StandardStrategy
StandardStrategy is the default strategy used in the calc of the influence on a given island
StepsIncrementAction
This action is used to let the player move mother nature a number of steps greater than the one specified on the chosen Assistant card.
StepsIncrementData
 
SwapAction
This action is used to swap students when a character permits it.
SwapCharacterSceneController
This class implements the controller of the swap scene
SwapData
 
SwapNotification
With this notification the server tell to the client that the chosen character needs a swap list to be used, and the client provides it.
Target
 
ThiefAction
This action is used to steal students from the hall of the player following characters logic.
ThiefData
 
TowerColor
This enum contains all color of the Towers, they are White and Black for 2-4 Player or additionally Grey for 3 Player.
TurnManager
This class handles the turn logic of each game
TurnManager.GameState
The different state of the game
View
View common interface, this can be implemented by various user interfaces (in our case GUI or CLI).
VirtualView
This class represents a fake view that is used to hide to the server the real views.
WinHandler
This class observer game component that can trigger a win condition (e.g. the sack, the board of islands, the schools of each player ecc.).
WinNotification
This notification is used by the server to tell about the victory of a player.
WinObservable
This class is extended by the entity of the game that represents a possible win condition.
WinObserver
This class is implemented by the WinHandler.
Wizard
This enum contains all type of Wizard that can be chosen by Player at the beginning of the game.
